sources.title: Carnival
sources.description: Title: Carnival Summary: A dancer attempts to escape from the narrow conventions of society and from the fate foretold for her at her birth. Directed by: Stanley Haynes Actors: Sally Gray, Michael Wilding, Stanley Holloway Production Company: Two Cities Films Release Date: 2 December 1946 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A dancer attempts to escape from the narrow conventions of society and from the fate foretold for her at her birth.
